label: VectorizableImageBinaryQuery
description: Vector search where the service vectorizes a base64 encoded image.

fields.label: Fields
fields.tooltip: Vector fields of type Collection(Edm.Single) to include in the vector search.

fields.label: K
fields.tooltip: Number of nearest neighbors to return as top hits.

fields.label: Base64 Image
fields.tooltip: Base64 encoded binary of an image to be vectorized.

fields.label: Filter Override
fields.tooltip: OData filter expression to apply to this specific vector query.

fields.label: Per Document Vector Limit
fields.tooltip: How many vectors can be matched from each document (0 = unlimited).

fields.label: Weight
fields.tooltip: Relative weight of this vector query compared to other vector/text queries.

fields.label: Exhaustive
fields.tooltip: When true, triggers an exhaustive k-nearest neighbor search across all vectors within the vector index.
